00015 #include "Minet.h"

00017 #define DEBUG_SEND 0
00018 #define DEBUG_RECV 0
00019 #define DEBUG_ARP  0
00020 
00021 using std::cerr;
00022 using std::endl;
00023 
00024 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
00025 {
00026   MinetHandle dd, ip, other, arp;
00027 
00028   MinetInit(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX);
00029 
00030   dd=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER) ? MinetConnect(MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00031   arp=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ARP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_ARP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00032   ip=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_IP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00033   other=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_OTHER_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_OTHER_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00034 
00035   if (dd==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER)) {
00036     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to device driver"));
00037     cerr << "Can't connect to device driver" << endl;
00038     return -1;
00039   }
00040   if (arp==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ARP_MODULE)) {
00041     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from arp module"));
00042     cerr << "Can't accept from arp module" << endl;
00043     return -1;
00044   }
00045   if (ip==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MODULE)) {
00046     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from ip module"));
00047     cerr << "Can't accept from ip module" << endl;
00048     return -1;
00049   }
00050   if (other==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_OTHER_MODULE)) {
00051     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from other module"));
00052     cerr << "Can't accept from other module" << endl;
00053     return -1;
00054   }
00055 
00056 
00057   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ethernet_mux operating"));
00058   cerr << "ethernet_mux operating" << endl;
00059 
00060   MinetEvent event;
00061 
00062   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00063     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
00064         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00065       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00066       cerr << "Unknown event ignored." << endl;
00067     } else {
00068       if (event.handle==dd) {
00069         RawEthernetPacket raw;
00070         unsigned short type;
00071         MinetReceive(dd,raw);
00072         memcpy((char*)(&type),&(raw.data[12]),2);
00073         type=ntohs(type);
00074         switch (type) {
00075         case PROTO_ARP:
00076           MinetSend(arp,raw);
00077           break;
00078         case PROTO_IP:
00079           MinetSend(ip,raw);
00080           break;
00081         default:
00082           MinetSend(other,raw);
00083           break;
00084         }
00085       }
00086       if (event.handle==arp) {
00087         RawEthernetPacket p;
00088         MinetReceive(arp,p);
00089 #if DEBUG_ARP
00090         cerr << "Writing out ARP Packet: " << p << endl;
00091 #endif
00092         MinetSend(dd,p);
00093       }
00094       if (event.handle==ip) {
00095         RawEthernetPacket p;
00096         MinetReceive(ip,p);
00097 
00098 #if DEBUG_SEND
00099         cerr << "ABOUT TO SEND OUT: " << endl;
00100         Packet check(p);
00101         check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00102         check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<IPHeader>(IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(check));
00103         check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<ICMPHeader>(ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH);
00104         EthernetHeader eh = check.FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00105         IPHeader iph = check.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00106         ICMPHeader icmph = check.FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00107 
00108         eh.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;
00109         iph.Print(cerr); cerr << endl;
00110         icmph.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;
00111         cerr << "END OF PACKET" << endl << endl;
00112 #endif
00113 
00114         MinetSend(dd,p);
00115       }
00116       if (event.handle==other) {
00117         RawEthernetPacket p;
00118         MinetReceive(other,p);
00119         MinetSend(dd,p);
00120       }
00121     }
00122   }
00123 }
